Welcome to my Engineering Page!

I am a Chicago-based mechanical engineer, programmer, and roboticist. Click on the different images to browse through various completed and ongoing projects!

Daylogger


A merry Chicago pigeon going about his day.

Soft Robot ("Teri")


My second author publication from research conducted while at Northwestern University under professor Todd D. Murphey.

Pinshooter


A Franka Emika Panda robot that my team programmed to identify and shoot specific colors of bowling pins based on voice input.
